医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的计算模型以前所未有的精度模拟癌细胞运动杜克大学的生物医学工程师显着增强了计算模型的能力，该模型可以模拟单个癌细胞在整个人体内长距离的移动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-computational-model-simulates-cancer-cell-movement-with-unprecedented- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-computational-model-simulates-cancer-cell-movement-with-unprecedented- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e20150be-f62a-4aa9-9c00-494ab69d9c1a Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:56:10 -0500 New computational model simulates cancer cell movement with unprecedented precision
研究揭示烟草烟雾对母乳的惊人影响，增加有毒元素研究表明，怀孕或哺乳期间主动和被动接触烟草烟雾都会显着增加母乳中汞、镉、铅和砷等有毒微量元素的含量，对婴儿构成严重的健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-exposes-tobacco-smokes-alarming-impact-on-breast-milk-elevating-有毒-elements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-exposes-tobacco-smokes-alarming-impact-on-breast-milk-elevating-有毒-elements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7bb496e-30e5-44a5-b7df-56c449fbf960 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:49:00 -0500 Study exposes tobacco smoke's alarming impact on breast milk, elevating toxic elements
研究发现，与交通相关的空气污染会导致血压升高一个多世纪以来，美国城市一直被交通繁忙的道路分割开来。州际高速公路和宽阔的主干道现已成为大多数大都市区的一个显着特征，汽车源源不断地涌入，将污染排放到附近的社区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Traffic-lated-air-pollution-raises-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Traffic-lated-air-pollution-raises-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffe05b99-804d-4c1e-b400-95c41cde8732 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:29:10 -0500 Traffic-related air pollution raises blood pressure, study finds
新的人工智能工具可以彻底改变儿童哮喘监测患有哮喘的成人和年龄较大的儿童可以在家中对症状进行客观测量，例如呼气峰流量 (PEF)，即一次用力呼气时的气流量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-AI-tool-could-revolutionize-asthma-monitoring-for-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-AI-tool-could-revolutionize-asthma-monitoring-for-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=927142ef-13e4-49d9-86a8-b248819dbd49 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:20:16 -0500 New AI tool could revolutionize asthma monitoring for children
机器学习解开抗菌素耐药性的秘密，识别超过 900 个关键基因研究人员采用基因注释、泛基因组学和机器学习等先进技术，识别出 12 种细菌中 900 多个与抗菌素耐药性相关的基因，其性能优于传统识别方法。这一突破性方法为耐药性的遗传基础提供了新的见解，有可能指导更有效抗生素的开发https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Machine-learning-unlocks-secrets-of-antimicrobial-resistance-identifying-over-900-key-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Machine-learning-unlocks-secrets-of-antimicrobial-resistance-identifying-over-900-key-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bbe9fdb-66b7-4e1e-9c18-03a59d11c895 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:17:00 -0500 Machine learning unlocks secrets of antimicrobial resistance, identifying over 900 key genes
了解那些选择通过自愿停止饮食来加速死亡的患者一些患者选择自愿停止饮食（VSED）作为加速死亡的一种方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Understanding-病人-who-choose-to-hasten-death-by-voluntarily-stopping-eating-and-drinking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Understanding-病人-who-choose-to-hasten-death-by-voluntarily-stopping-eating-and-drinking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f347e64-a210-473a-b80a-ec83a54f2dd5 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:06:33 -0500
DNA甲基化：基因表达变异和疾病表现的关键因素希伯来大学哈达萨医学院的 Asaf Hellman 教授和他的研究团队公布了甲基化定向调控网络领域的新发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/DNA-methylation-A-key-player-in-gene-express-variation-and-disease-manifestation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/DNA-methylation-A-key-player-in-gene-express-variation-and-disease-manifestation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d910de17-ea59-4152-a4cf-9f49af158aa2 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 21:50:33 -0500 DNA methylation: A key player in gene expression variation and disease manifestation
遵守 WCRF/AICR 指南可显着降低癌症风险更加遵守世界癌症研究基金会/美国癌症研究所 (WCRF/AICR) 的癌症预防建议 -；鼓励健康的生活方式——；与所有癌症的综合风险和某些单一癌症（例如乳腺癌）的风险较低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Adherence-to-the-WCRFAICR-guidelines-can-significantly-reduce-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Adherence-to-the-WCRFAICR-guidelines-can-significantly-reduce-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55fc74e8-9ddd-48bc-b637-2e72f785dcb3 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 21:33:28 -0500 Adherence to the WCRF/AICR guidelines can significantly reduce cancer risk
Omega-3 成为焦点：EPA 和 DHA 对运动员健康和表现的影响研究论文回顾了 omega-3 脂肪酸、EPA 和 DHA 对运动员的影响，讨论了它们在炎症控制、认知功能和肌肉维护方面的益处，以及需要进一步研究以充分了解它们的影响。它还讨论了这些补充剂的风险和最佳摄入量，强调了它们在改善运动表现和恢复方面的潜力，并且在推荐剂量下将副作用降至最低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Omega-3s-in-the-spotlight-The-impact-of-EPA-and-DHA-on-athlete-health-and-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Omega-3s-in-the-spotlight-The-impact-of-EPA-and-DHA-on-athlete-health-and-performance.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7341e434-ef8f-40cb-824a-e97826123d0b Mon, 27 Nov 2023 21:23:00 -0500 Omega-3s in the spotlight: The impact of EPA and DHA on athlete health and performance
怀孕期间的歧视可能会损害正在发育的后代大脑众所周知，歧视和文化适应的经历会对人的健康产生有害影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Discrimination-during-pregnancy-can-harm-the-eveloping-offspring-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Discrimination-during-pregnancy-can-harm-the-eveloping-offspring-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe28d6c4-12db-43a2-be83-fa93a6a1ac03 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 21:16:27 -0500 Discrimination during pregnancy can harm the eveloping offspring brain
